scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises oversized documents including letters addressed to John Wesley Hunt in Lexington, Kentucky, regarding debts and his shared business with Abijah Hunt; several bills, invoices, and account statements detailing purchases made by John W. Hunt and business partner Abijah Hunt for their general store; a power of attorney; and receipts of wagoners shipping merchandise for John W. Hunt and Abijah Hunt. Copies of these documents are stored in Box 1, Folders 5 and 6 along with other materials from 1795.
